page.title: 19A Typical day in Manuden 2
page.content: Mums are at home doing the house work. The children are now going to assembly.Between ten and eleven the children are outside in the play ground. Some mums are having a cup of tea or coffee. Between eleven and twelve mums are getting the lunch ready. In the classroom the children are working. At twelve o'clock most people are having lunch. After lunch some of the children are at choir and others are playing out side on the field. At one o'clock some girls are playing recorders. I could hear them and it sounded nice. The children that weren't playing the recorders were still outside playing and making a lot of noise. At quarter past one the children are lining up to go inside . Some mums are going shopping.
